select ssr.id, ssr.student_id, ssr.course_id, ssr.schedule_id, ssr.score, stui.name as studentName, stui.images as studentImages, ci.name as courseName, ci.address, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName, sci.course_date, sci.start_time, sci.end_time from schedule_score_record ssr left join student_info stui on (stui.id = ssr.student_id) left join course_info ci on (ci.id = ssr.course_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.staff_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = ci.major_id) left join schedule_class_info sci on (sci.id = ssr.schedule_id) where 1 = 1
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleScoreRecord.courseName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleScoreRecord.majorName},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scheduleScoreRecord.staffName},'%')
order by sci.course_date desc
